scrapflyApiKey.title: Scrapfly API Key
scrapflyApiKey.description: Your Scrapfly API key from https://scrapfly.io/dashboard

scrapeType.title: Scrape Type
scrapeType.description: Type of data to scrape from G2

numberOfReviews.title: Number of Reviews
numberOfReviews.description: Target number of reviews to scrape. The scraper will paginate until this number is reached (only applies when scrapeType is 'reviews')

maxPages.title: Max Pages (Optional)
maxPages.description: Maximum number of pages to scrape. If set, this overrides the numberOfReviews setting

enableSearch.title: Enable Search Scraping
enableSearch.description: Enable search scraping in addition to the main scrape type

searchUrl.title: Search URL
searchUrl.description: G2 search URL (e.g., https://www.g2.com/search?query=Infrastructure). Required if 'Enable Search Scraping' is checked

searchMaxPages.title: Search Max Pages
searchMaxPages.description: Maximum number of search pages to scrape
